name: calibre-web
description: Calibre-Web is a self-hosted web app to browse, read, and manage eBooks stored in a Calibre database. It features OPDS, Kindle syncing, user roles, and metadata editing from a browser.
features: eBook Management: Browse and manage Calibre library through web browser. Access anywhere.
OPDS Support: Compatible with OPDS readers for mobile access. Universal compatibility.
Kindle Syncing: Send books directly to Kindle devices. Seamless reading.
User Roles: Multi-user support with permission controls. Shared library.
Metadata Editing: Edit book information from browser. Complete control.
Web Reading: Read eBooks directly in browser. No downloads needed.
Self-Hosted: Keep your eBook collection private. Data sovereignty.
